name: LMP Automotive Holdings, Inc.
description: LMP Automotive Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of automotive subscription services, aiming to revolutionize the way consumers engage with vehicles. Founded in 2017, LMP operates within the rapidly growing automotive technology market, leveraging innovative subscription models that provide users with an alternative to traditional vehicle ownership. The company's primary offering allows customers to subscribe to vehicles on a flexible basis, catering to the diverse needs of modern drivers. LMP enhances customer experience by providing access to a variety of vehicles without the long-term commitment associated with leasing or buying. This model supports eco-friendly practices by promoting vehicle sharing and reduced ownership burdens. In addition to subscription services, LMP is involved in automotive retail, offering a selection of new and pre-owned vehicles for sale. The company is committed to using technology to streamline operations and improve customer interactions, ensuring a seamless and efficient experience. As LMP continues to grow, it aims to expand its service offerings and geographic reach, positioning itself as a leader in the automotive subscription space and contributing to the future of mobility.
ceo: Sammy L. A. F. K. S. S. L. P. Smith

key_executives.name: Sammy L. A. F. K. S. S. L. P. Smith
Richard A. M. D. L. P. Smith

seo.meta_title: LMP Automotive Holdings, Inc. | Automotive Subscription Services
seo.meta_description: Explore LMP Automotive Holdings, Inc., a leader in automotive subscription services, providing flexible solutions for modern drivers. Learn about our innovative offerings and commitment to the future of mobility.

faq.question: What services does LMP offer?
faq.answer: LMP offers automotive subscription services and vehicle sales, providing flexible access to vehicles without long-term commitment.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of LMP Automotive?
faq.answer: Sammy L. A. F. K. S. S. L. P. Smith is the CEO of LMP Automotive Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is LMP headquartered?
faq.answer: LMP is headquartered in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What types of vehicles can I subscribe to?
faq.answer: LMP provides a wide range of vehicles for subscription, including cars, SUVs, and trucks.
